entries.guard_1_1: Well I've been training in the art of melee combat for quite some time.  Let me tell ya: the more you practice, the stronger you become.  I feel like I could take on a rancor!
entries.guard_1_2: I hear they make some powerful weapons on Kashyyyk.  Now that the Empire is taking control though, I don't know how much longer we have to find a decent weapon there.
entries.guard_1_3: Here's a crazy thought: Mustafar has some pretty rich history, right?  Jedi and the like battling it out there.  I figure there's got to be plenty of old artifacts there just waiting to be dug up.
